meanings.sent1: The drekkiest day of the year was when it rained mud.
meanings.sent2: The old, torn couch was the drekkiest piece of furniture in the room.
meanings.sent3: The drekkiest joke at the party made everyone laugh uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: Her singing voice was the drekkiest sound I had ever heard.
meanings.sent5: The drekkiest smell from the garbage bin lingered in the kitchen for days.

meanings.sent1: The drekkiest part of the movie was when the main character tripped over nothing.
meanings.sent2: After the storm, the streets were the drekkiest they had ever been.
meanings.sent3: The drekkiest sandwich I ever made fell apart before I could take a bite.
meanings.sent4: His excuses for being late were the drekkiest stories I had ever heard.
meanings.sent5: The drekkiest taste in the soup came from too much salt added by mistake.
